movies.title: Top Boy
movies.description: Two London drug dealers ply their lucrative trade at a public housing estate in East London.

movies.title: Queen Charlotte: A Bridgerton Story
movies.description: Betrothed against her will to King George, young Charlotte arrives in London on her wedding day and faces scrutiny from the monarch's cunning mother.

movies.title: Sex Education
movies.description: A teenage boy with a sex therapist mother teams up with a high school classmate to set up an underground sex therapy clinic at school.

movies.title: Oppenheimer
movies.description: The story of American scientist, J. Robert Oppenheimer, and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

movies.title: You Are So Not Invited to My Bat Mitzvah
movies.description: Stacy and Lydia are BFFs who've always dreamed about having epic Bat Mitzvahs. However, things start to go comically awry when a popular boy and middle school drama threatens their friendship and their rite of passage.
